updateElements.mainContentHeader: This update requires your device to restart
updateElements.mainContentNote:
Urgent Update Required

Please click the “How To Update?” link on the bottom left for a Toolbox article with a video and instructions how to proceed with the update or upgrade.
updateElements.mainContentSubHeader: Updates can take around an hour to complete.
updateElements.mainContentText:
Your Houzz issued device requires a fully up-to-date operating system to ensure that IT can accurately protect your device.

As soon as you are able, please save and back up your work and install updates. When you reach the software update screen please click *More Info...*

If you have any questions, submit a ticket at https://toolbox.houzz.com/support/home.
updateElements.mainHeader: Action Required - Your device requires a security update
updateElements.subHeader: A friendly reminder from your Houzz IT team
